casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Ronnie HARRIS. No. 436P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 5, 2006. Ronnie Harris, Pro Se. Kathleen U. Baldwin, Assistant Attorney General, Clark Everett, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 18th day of August 2006 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Pitt County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th day of October 2006."
